name: GROMACS Environment
postCreateCommand: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y cmake build-essential libx11-dev libxext-dev wget && wget https://ftp.gromacs.org/pub/gromacs/gromacs-2023.3.tar.gz && tar xfz gromacs-2023.3.tar.gz && cd gromacs-2023.3 && mkdir build && cd build && cmake .. -DGMX_BUILD_OWN_FFTW=ON -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr/local/gromacs && make -j4 && sudo make install && echo 'source /usr/local/gromacs/bin/GMXRC' >> ~/.bashrc
